en: He explained that "the shape of the fluctuations" refers to the fall after rise of some economic indicators growth rate in July.
zh: 他解释“形有波动”是指7月份部分经济指标增速确实是有所回落。

en: As for the domestic situation, the whole economy is still in the critical stage of adjustment, adjustment labor pains are releasing and the economy is under great pressure, so some indicators are still fluctuating.
zh: 从国内情况看，整个经济还处在调整的关键阶段，调整的阵痛在释放，经济面临不小的下行压力，所以有些指标有些波动。

en: Sheng Laiyun pointed out that there was a special case in July, with serious floods, high temperature and hot weather which have brought some impact on production and operation of some areas.
zh: 盛来运指出，7月份还有一个特殊情况，洪涝灾害比较严重，高温酷暑天气对一些地区的生产经营带来了一些影响。

en: The cargo turnover growth rate in July fell back 3.6 percentage and floods on these areas have a certain impact on traffic.
zh: 7月份的货物周转运量增速比上月回落3.6个百分点，洪涝灾害对这些地区的交通有一定的影响。

en: From these factors, it is quite normal to have some fluctuations in some indicators. And such thing is expected.
zh: 从这些因素来看，7月份部分指标出现波动也是很正常，也是在预期之中。

en: He said, "The potential is still good" means that despite the fallback of economic growth, the overall economic performance is stable and steady. And the good momentum has not changed.
zh: 他表示，“势仍向好”指的是尽管经济增速有所回落，但是经济运行总体平稳，稳中有进、稳中向好的大势没有变。

en: In July, CPI rose by 1.8%, with a month-on-month rise of 0.2%. From January to July, CPI rose by 2.1%, so the overall price situation is stable.
zh: 7月份CPI上涨1.8%，环比上涨0.2%;1-7月份CPI上涨2.1%，所以物价形势总体稳定。

en: According to the statistics of hot weather in the districts and counties by the portal of the Chongqing Municipal Bureau of Meteorology, in addition to Youyang, the rest of the city can receive different degrees of high temperature allowance.
zh: 根据重庆市气象局门户网对各区县高温天气的统计，除酉阳外，我市其余各地都能领取到不同程度的高温津贴。

en: At present, at least 28 provinces in the country have clearly defined the standard of the allowance, but the standards issued by provinces and municipalities are not the same, and people in Chongqing receive the allowance based on the count of high-temperature working days.
zh: 目前全国至少已有28个省份明确了津贴发放标准，不过各省市发放的标准并不一样，而重庆则是按高温工作日津贴的方式领取高温津贴。

en: In case of temperature between 35 and 37 ℃, people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above 37℃, people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
zh: 35℃以上37℃以下的，按每人每天不低于10元标准发放；37℃以上的，按每人每天不低于15元标准发放。

en: In accordance with this standard, people in Kaizhou which has the highest number of high temperature can receive 330 yuan. And people in Chengkou with the least days of high temperature can receive 80 yuan. And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.
zh: 按照这一标准，上个月高温天气天数最多的开州能领到330元，天数最少的城口则是80元，而酉阳最高温由于没达到高温标准外，所以没有高温津贴。

en: In the past, many companies adopt cool drinks as high temperature allowance. The city safety supervision bureau deemed that this behavior does not meet the current regulation.
zh: 以往不少单位会以清凉饮品冲抵高温津贴，市安监局表示这种行径不合乎现行办法。

en: The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
zh: 市人社局表示，员工遇到高温下作业却没收到高温津贴的，可通过企业所在的劳动争议调解机构争取合法权益，或拨打12333投诉。

en: So the high temperature allowance is not within the minimum wage, it must be issued in cash and not substituted by physical objects such as drinks.
zh: 因此高温津贴不在最低工资范围内，必须以现金形式发放，不能用饮料等实物代替。

en: The newly built Urumqi station is located in Urumqi high-speed rail area, with the whole construction area of around 100,000 square meters.
zh: 新建成的乌鲁木齐站位于乌鲁木齐市高铁片区，整个建筑面积约有10万平方米。

en: The layer 1 and 2 are for entrance, waiting room and office, commercial use while the layer -1 is for exit.
zh: 地上1、2层为进站、候车厅及办公、商业用房，地下1层是出站层。

en: At present, Urumqi station is Xinjiang's largest integrated transport hub, integrated with high-speed rail, rail transportation, public transportation and rental as one. People can achieve a variety of seamless dockings.
zh: 目前，乌鲁木齐站是新疆最大的综合交通枢纽，集高铁、轨道交通、公交、出租等为一体，可实现各种换乘方式无缝对接。

en: If you need help, you can choose the 41 call buttons and get timely services.
zh: 如果需要帮助，可就近按动站内设置的41个呼唤按钮进行选择，就可以获得及时服务。

en: Now, passengers can buy tickets at these two stations. The train passing time between these two stations is about 10 minutes. Passengers need to pay attention to the detailed name of the initial and terminal station on the ticket.
zh: 现在两个站均可以买票乘车，他们之间的列车通行时间在10分钟左右，旅客需要注意票面始发和终点站的具体站名。

en: Urumqi new passenger station, after its official launching into operation, will become an important platform to build the national integrated transport city and promote the construction of "Silk Road Economic Zone" and the new district.
zh: 乌鲁木齐新客站的正式投入运营将成为新疆打造全国性综合交通城市的重要平台，推进“丝绸之路经济带”和新区建设。

en: Gracia is a cute female toucan, exuding the breath of tropical rain forest.
zh: 格雷西亚是一只萌萌的雌性巨嘴鸟，浑身散发着热带雨林的气息。

en: In Costa Rica, one of the Central American countries, Toucan Gracia and its story have long been known.
zh: 在中美洲国家哥斯达黎加，巨嘴鸟格雷西亚和它的故事早已家喻户晓。

en: At the press conference on August 10, after postoperative rehabilitation, Gresham finally appeared and showed people its brand new 3D printing plastic beak.
zh: 8月10日的新闻发布会上，术后康复的格雷西亚终于亮相，向人们展示它崭新的3D打印塑料鸟喙。

en: The newcomer Grecia was slightly shy initially, but soon became lively, rolling in the basin frolic and eating grapes with a new beak.
zh: 初进新家的格雷西亚稍显腼腆，但不多时就变得活泼起来，在水盆里打滚嬉闹，用新喙吃葡萄。

en: Despite this internal reinforcement, the toucan's beak is fragile and may be broken when it is hurt.
zh: 虽然有这种内部加固成份，巨嘴鸟的喙还是脆弱，受到伤害时会破碎。

en: Now Gracia has been able to use the new beak to drink water, eat, and even peck fine grains.
zh: 如今格雷西亚已能熟练使用新喙喝水、吃东西，甚至啄起细小谷粒。

en: "The design of the finished product costs about two months and it just takes 4-5 hours to print it."
zh: “最终成品的设计花了大约2个月，打印出来只需4、5个小时。”

en: "3D printing is not the future technology but really enters into your life." Thomas Lange, the chairman of US SG3D printing company said in an interview with Xinhua International.
zh: “3D打印并不是未来技术，它已经实实在在走进了你我的生活。”美国SG3D打印公司董事长托马斯·朗格在接受新华国际记者采访时说。

en: In January 2015, Gracia, lying on a farm in the town of Alajuela in the middle of Costa Rica, was found with blood covering on its body.
zh: 2015年1月，在哥斯达黎加中部阿拉胡埃拉省格雷西亚的一个农场，浑身是血的巨嘴鸟格雷西亚被人发现。

en: People came spontaneously to try their utmost to help Gracia restore its life before hurting.
zh: 人们自发前来，尽最大努力帮助格雷西亚尽可能恢复受伤前的生活。

en: "We first scanned Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue."
zh: “我们先对格雷西亚扫描，然后设计、制作出一个稍长于它上喙剩余部分的延长假体，用粘胶固定在它的上喙上。”

en: "This can reduce the risk of further intrusive damage to Gracia," Lange told Xinhua International.
zh: “这样可以减少对格雷西亚造成进一步侵入性伤害。”朗格对新华国际记者说。

en: Before installing the prosthesis, the staff cleared the broken beak of Gracia every day to prevent infection.
zh: 在安装假体之前，工作人员每天都要为格雷西亚清理断喙，以防感染。

en: The documentary "The State of the Toucan" shows people how a small Toucan has changed a country and how people get involved in the fight against torture of animals.
zh: 纪录片《巨嘴鸟之国》向人们展示，一只小小的巨嘴鸟是如何让一个国家为之改变、如何让国民都参与到反对虐待动物当中来。

en: Core Tip: Japanese oil companies expressed vigilance to the rise of Chinese oil companies, especially known as the "teapot" of China's small independent refinery.
zh: 核心提示：日本油企尤其对被称为“茶壶”的中国小型独立炼油厂崛起表示警惕。

en: August 12 report on Cankaoxiaoxi website: Japan's largest oil company JX Energy believes that "China's export expansion is one of the reasons for the market downturn."
zh: 参考消息网8月12日报道日媒称，日本最大的石油企业JX能源认为，“中国的出口扩大是行情低迷的原因之一。

en: Before obtaining the import license for crude oil, "teapot refinery" generally refines oil from the heavy oil, which has high sulfur content and is imported from Russia.
zh: 在获得原油进口许可之前，“茶壶炼油厂”一般从俄罗斯等地进口硫磺含量较高的重油进行提炼。

en: The petroleum products are poor in quality due to high sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
zh: 生产出来的石油产品硫磺含量较高，油品不佳，成为造成环境污染的原因之一。

en: After obtaining crude oil import license, "teapot refinery" can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have low sulfur content and improved petroleum products.
zh: 在获得原油进口许可后，“茶壶炼油厂”能够进口硫磺含量较低的阿曼产原油和俄罗斯产原油，其石油产品的品质也出现提升。

en: East Fuel General Oil Company said, "With China's domestic oil product quality standards continuing to improve, the refining capacity of the equipment also increased.
zh: 东燃通用石油公司表示，“随着中国国内的石油产品品质标准不断提高，炼油设备的能力也出现提升。

en: As a result, the quality of oil products exported from China gradually rivalled that of Japan (the world's highest quality).
zh: 结果，中国对外出口的石油产品品质逐渐达到与（世界最高品质的）日本相同的水平”。

en: As China's exports of petroleum products have a huge impact on the Asian market, teapot refinery got more attentions.
zh: 由于中国出口的石油产品对亚洲市场行情的影响巨大，对茶壶炼油厂的关注度也越来越高。

en: 2016 Liqun sunshine student support action of Yangtze Evening News started from May 26. After two months of registration, the total number of poor students applying for grants is up to 800.
zh: 2016年扬子晚报利群阳光助学行动自5月26日启动，经过两个月的报名，申请助学金的贫困学子总人数达800多人。

en: During the educational process, more than 1.2 million yuan of social donations has been obtained (the detailed donations are publicized in five batches). This can help at least 240 young students achieve their college dream.
zh: 助学过程中，已收到社会捐款超过120万元(已分五批公示)，至少可以帮助240位寒门学子圆梦大学。

en: At present, donations continued and this newspaper called on the community to continue to lend a helping hand, so that more families with children can obtain funding and social care.
zh: 目前，捐款仍在继续，本报吁请社会继续伸出援手，让更多家庭困难的孩子能够得到资助，得到社会的关怀。

en: "Liqun sunshine student action" is a well-known Chinese charity brand. Yangzi Evening News Liqun sunshine student action has been initiated in Jiangsu since 2003. More than 4,000 students have been supported.
zh: 利群阳光助学行动，是中国著名慈善品牌，扬子晚报利群阳光助学行动2003年起在江苏开展，资助贫困学子累计超过4000名。

en: The scope of the fund covers college entrance freshmen, excluding tuition-free majors. Students qualified for the fund should have excellent study performance and family poverty.
zh: 该活动资助范围是高考本科录取新生,不含免学费专业；品学兼优，家庭贫困。

en: According to the statistics bureau, the population growth of New Zealand had previously exceeded 2% in 1974 and during the 1950s-1960s ("baby boom").
zh: 统计局表示，新西兰人口增幅此前仅在１９７４年和上世纪５０年代到６０年代早期的“婴儿潮”人口出生高峰时期超过２％。

en: From the population structure point of view, a large influx of immigrants means that the ratio of "working age population" aged 15 to 39 years old gradually expanded.
zh: 从人口结构上看，大量移民涌入意味着１５岁至３９岁的“劳动年龄人口”比例逐步扩大。

en: At the same time, the population growth of people aged over 65 years is also 3.6%, reaching 700,000.
zh: 同时，６５岁以上的老龄人口增幅同样为３.６％，达到７０万人。

en: It is understood that the goods category of this freight train cover six major categories, namely industrial raw materials, machinery and equipment, industrial spare parts, building materials, food, light industrial products, and 206 varieties in total.
zh: 据了解，此班货运班列运输的货物品类涵盖工业原材料、机械设备、工业零配件、建材、食品、轻工产品六大类、共计206个品种。

en: As of August 11 this year, the Xinzhu station opened a total of 221 freight trains and 10,009 vehicles. A total of 338,000 tons of goods have been transported. Among them, 84 freight trains began operation in 2016, a year-on-year increase of 47%.
zh: 截至今年8月11日，新筑车站共开行中亚班列221列、10009车，累计发运出口货物33.8万吨，其中2016年开行84列，同比增长47%。

en: As of the end of July, the volume of container received for Sino-Asia freight trains reached 64,000 TEU, an increase of 8% over the same period in 2015.
zh: 截至7月底，中亚班列集装箱到发量突破6.4万标箱，较2015年同期增长8%。

en: With the increase of the operation of Sino-Asia freight trains, the freight volume of the Xinzhu Railway Station of Xi'an Railway Bureau increased year by year.
zh: 随着中亚班列的加密开行，西安铁路局新筑车站货运量逐年提升。

en: Although now it is the beginning of autumn, the power of "afterheat" seems not to be weaker at all than that in the summer.
zh: 虽说现在已经立秋，可是“秋老虎”的威力似乎一点不比夏天差。

en: UV not only tans your skin but also sunburns it, so how to make the skin go through the military training, without sunburn?
zh: 紫外线不仅让同学们的皮肤变黑，更加会晒伤肌肤，如何让肌肤能顺利度过军训，不被晒伤？

en: Sunblock is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
zh: 防晒霜包装上一般都标有SPF和PA，SPF是指防晒指数，是针对UVB紫外线的，我们常见的SPF指数有15、30、50等。

en: The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more effective role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
zh: 标有PA的产品是针对UVA的，这样防晒品会发挥更加有效的作用，通常情况下，PA的强度用+来表示，多一个+表示有效防护时间延长。

en: Water-based sunblock with a strong penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
zh: 油性肌肤应选择渗透力较强的水性防晒用品，防晒喷雾也是不错的选择。

en: Remember to apply sunblock half an hour in advance, because sunscreen products take time to completely penetrate into the skin.
zh: 切记提前半小时涂防晒霜，因为防晒产品需要时间才能完全渗入到皮肤。

en: As the skin has just been stimulated by the sun's sake, do not immediately use whitening products after returning from military training.
zh: 由于皮肤刚受到日晒刺激的缘故，军训回来不要立刻用美白产品。

en: This trade show attracts investment and exhibition worldwide. In particular, it enhances the invitation on countries and target market countries related to the Belt and Road Initiative.
zh: 本届展会面向全球招商招展，特别是加大了对“一带一路”沿线国家和目标市场国家的邀请力度。

en: As the host place of "Hunan Exposition", Loudi has established trade relationship with more than 90 countries around the world.
zh: 作为“湘博会”的主办地，娄底已与全世界90多个国家建立了贸易往来关系。

en: According to the report of Popular Science, an American monthly website, on August 11, the US Air Force was interested in copying this effect.
zh: 据美国《大众科学》月刊网站8月11日报道，美国空军对复制这一效应感兴趣。

en: But firstly, the team that signed contract with the air force must prove that the scientific principles will work.
zh: 但首先，这些同空军签订合同的团队必须证明有关科学原理会奏效。

en: From last November to this January, the price of Qinhuangdao 5500 kcal steam coal lingers at 370 yuan/ton and 90% of the coal enterprises fell into a loss.
zh: 去年11月到今年1月，秦皇岛5500大卡动力煤价格长期在370元/吨低位徘徊，90%的煤炭企业陷入亏损。

en: With the price rising, come along the concerns of various industries: will a number of small coal mines resume production?
zh: 随着价格回升，各界担心随之产生：一批小煤矿会不会复工复产？

en: These three superficial factors reflect the reason behind the relative lagging behind of our growth pattern change. That is, the government-led growth has not yet been fundamentally changed.
zh: 这三个表层的因素还是反映出了过去我们的增长方式转变相对滞后的原因，就是由政府主导的增长方式至今还没有得到根本性的转变。

en: Thirdly, some of the provinces that are relatively slow in progress may face greater risks if they seek acceleration in progress in the second half of the year.
zh: 第三，如果目前进度比较慢的一些省份要在下半年赶进度，它们可能会面临较大的风险。

en: In this case, relying on the central allowance to raise funds to promote the process of production capacity may have a negative impact.
zh: 在这种情况下，依靠中央奖补资金来推进去产能的进程可能会产生一定负面的影响。

en: First, the overcapacity cut is not a simple cap control.
zh: 首先，去产能不是简单的进行总量控制。

en: Our goal is to eliminate the backward production capacity, promote the optimization of the structure and restructure the new format of the entire coal industry.
zh: 我们的目的是要通过淘汰落后的产能，推进结构的优化，重构整个煤炭行业的新业态。

en: Second, in order to complete this year's overcapacity cut task within this year, we must give full play to the power of administrative supervision.
zh: 第二，要想在今年年内完成今年的去产能任务，我们还是要充分发挥行政监督和行政监察的力量。

en: Finally, we should strengthen the role of social security.
zh: 最后，我们要加强社会保障的兜底作用。

en: Because the market is directly related to the employment problem, we have to strengthen the employment skills training of employees.
zh: 因为市场直接涉及到就业的问题，所以我们要加强对员工和职工的就业技能培训。

en: "The reason for the ranking decline is that Brazilian GDP growth is expected to worsen in the medium term."
zh: “排名下降的原因是外资对于中期内巴西GDP发展的预期恶化。”

en: The International Investment Attractiveness Index of Credit Suisse Bank includes four sub-indices: infrastructure, economic outlook, business environment and direct investment.
zh: 瑞信银行国际投资吸引力指数包括4个分项指数：基础设施、经济前景、商业环境和直接投资量。

en: "There are 288 'green land investment' projects in Brazil, with an average annual rise of 314 from 2003 to 2014".
zh: “在巴西共有288个‘绿地投资’项目，而2003年至2014年的年平均量为314个”。

en: Title: Canadian police killed IS supporters: homemade bomb attacks downtown preparations near the end
zh: 原标题：加拿大警方击毙IS支持者：自制炸弹袭击闹市准备工作近尾声

en: The taxi company said the taxi was dispatched to the Dreyfus before the police arrived.
zh: 出租车公司表示，这辆出租车在警方到达前被调度到德赖弗家中。

en: Canadian police said at a news conference on Wednesday that the information received by the police included the "martyrdom video" sent by the young man to the US Federal Bureau of Investigation. According to the video, the young man will launch strike.
zh: 加拿大警方在周三的新闻发布会中表示，警方收到的信息包括美国联邦调查局提供的有关这名青年将要实施袭击的"殉道视频"。

en: The incident is the first time for the police to kill terror suspects before the incident after Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau came to power last year.
zh: 此次事件是加拿大总理贾斯廷·特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）去年上台后，警方首次在事发前击毙恐怖嫌疑人。

en: The two tributaries will conduct construction via social financing. The charges have been approved by the relevant provincial government departments.
zh: 这两条支流航道采取社会融资方式进行改造建设,收费已获省政府相关部门批准。

en: The old Wanfu River channel flows through Jinxiang, Yu Tai and then through the Nanyang Lake into the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal main channel, with a total length of 32.5 km.
zh: 老万福河航道流经金乡、鱼台,经南阳湖进入京杭大运河主航道,全长32.5公里。

en: According to the navigation needs, the old Wanfu River channel takes the mode of conservation and transformation. Dredging was conducted on the local depth and curve cut-off on the local sharp bend. Then the navigation conditions can be improved.
zh: 根据通航需要,老万福河航道采取养护改造的方式,对局部水深进行了浚深,局部急弯进行裁弯取直等,通航条件得以改善。

en: The renovation project of the two waterway started construction in February 2011. The delivery inspection was conducted in January 2015. The investment construction and operation main body is Jining City Anping Canal Logistics Service Center.
zh: 两条航道的改造工程于2011年2月开工建设,2015年1月完成交工验收,投资建设和运营主体为济宁市安平运河物流服务中心。

en: In accordance with the "loan construction and charging for repaying loan" principle, Jining City Anping Canal Logistics Service Center will collect channel tolls according to the charge standard approved by Shandong Provincial Price Bureau.
zh: 按照“贷款建设、收费还贷”的原则,济宁市安平运河物流服务中心依据山东省物价局批复的收费标准征收航道通行费。

en: The toll collection date is from June 15, 2016 to June 14, 2019.
zh: 通行费征收时间自2016年6月15日起至2019年6月14日止。

en: Social funds for the construction of public infrastructure are in line with national policy requirements and have become a way to break the bottleneck of funding.
zh: 社会资金用于公共基础设施的建设符合国家政策的要求,也成为破解资金瓶颈的途径。

en: Actually, this 50-meter freestyle is not the subject of Ning Zetao. His performance and best achievement in Kazan World Championships also indicate it is not possible for him to make breakthrough in this project.
zh: 可就在50米自由泳预赛中，宁泽涛再一次刷新了人们的“底线”。

en: Sure enough, Ta Kung Pao, an authoritative media in Hong Kong, revealed that the biggest reason for Ning Zetao to lose is that he has lost interest in swimming.
zh: 其实50米自由泳并非宁泽涛主项，他在喀山世锦赛上的表现和最好成绩，也决定了他在这个项目取得突破的可能性不大。

en: Many factors may have a great impact on his future ideas. He is now more interested in entering the entertainment circle.
zh: 果然，香港权威媒体《大公报》透露，宁泽涛失利的最大原因，就在于他已经失去了对游泳的兴趣。

en: After Kazan World Championships, Ning Zetao instantly become celebrity with his good look and excellent performance.
zh: 场外的许多因素，可能对他对未来的想法产生了很大影响，他现在对进军娱乐圈可能更感兴趣。

en: In this case, that Ning Zetao chooses to withdraw and joins the entertainment circle, is not only his freedom, but also a seemingly viable way.
zh: 各种商业活动找上门来，美好的钱途，成为一条金光闪烁的大道。

en: At the 2000 Sydney Olympic Games, the already 21-year-old Liu Xuan came to the end of athlete career.
zh: 但宁泽涛需要看看，自己和这些前辈相比，是不是具备了足够的资格呢？

en: The beautiful appearance of Liu Xuan makes her quickly remembered and also lays a foundation for her to join the entertainment circle.
zh: 2000年悉尼奥运会，已经21岁的刘璇已经来到了运动员生涯的末期。

en: After retirement, Liu Xuan starred in a number of TV series, and in 2013 she set up her own studio.
zh: 刘璇靓丽的外表让她迅速被人们记住，也奠定了她今后进军娱乐圈的基础。

en: Tian Liang participated in the single and double ten-meter match of two Olympic Games, and won 2 gold and 2 silver.
zh: 退役后，刘璇出演了多部电视剧，并在2013年成立了自己的工作室。

en: But when he was defeated by his counterpart Hu Jia at the single 10-meter match in the 2004 Olympic Games, Tian Liang's competitive state slipped and it was said he was dismissed by the diving team.
zh: 田亮参加了两次奥运会的单双人十米台比赛，并获得了2金2银。

en: The once gold generation Yang Wei, Li Xiaopeng and Chen Yibing all participated in a variety of variety show.
zh: 而他和女儿参加“爸爸去哪”等综艺节目，更是让他赚足了眼球。

en: And Chen Yibing has become a ring king while leading his team to win the champion in the 2012 Olympic Games men's team.
zh: 值得一提的是，杨威李小鹏当时带领中国获得了2008年奥运会男团冠军，杨威更是两次拿到个人全能金牌，被称为全能王。

en: However, these game players mainly focus on the venue, they just touch and then go at the variety show.
zh: 而在伦敦奥运会上遭遇误判痛失金牌的后，陈一冰大度的举动，也让他圈粉无数。

en: Even for Tian Liang and Liu Xuan, who are not new in the entertainment circle, common people always think of their performance at the Olympic Games when mentioning them.
zh: 毕竟运动员踏入一个新的领域，无论是能力还是人脉，均是一个空白状态。

en: And the introduction of Yang Wei and Li Xiaopeng at the variety show is always Olympic Games Champion.
zh: 即使是田亮、刘璇这样混迹娱乐圈多年的“老人”，普通观众提起他们，更多的还是想到他们在奥运会上的表现。

en: Compared with these people, Ning Zetao is slightly weaker for the title of Swimming World Championships.
zh: 而杨威、李小鹏等新人，在综艺节目出场时的介绍，无一例外都是“奥运冠军”。

en: Moreover, compared with the withdrawal of Tian Liang, Liu Xuan and Yang Wei, etc. at their peaks, the withdrawal of Ning Zetao at 23 after some setback would cause immeasurable effects to the negative influence of his image.
zh: 更何况，相比于田亮、刘璇、杨威等人的功成身退，宁泽涛若在23岁、运动生涯稍遇挫折就急流勇退，对其形象造成的负面影响大概也是不可估量。

en: At the very least, Ning Zetao can totally rely on his great looks to win the support of thousands of huge fans.
zh: 退一万步说，宁泽涛长得帅，完全可以依靠颜值获得万千脑残粉的支持。

en: You have to listen to your inner voice on your life path. But as for how to choose, Ning Zetao should be quite conscious.
zh: 人生之路选择全凭个人意愿，但到底如何选择，宁泽涛心里应该有数。

en: The benefits of online social network are obvious, convenient and quick, so it is particularly vulnerable to the favor of young people.
zh: 线上社交的好处是显而易见的，比如方便快捷，所以特别容易受到年轻族群的青睐。

en: A survey of college students' social habits shows that 57% of college students spend more than 5 hours on mobile phone and is almost inseparable to his mobile phone during their daily lives.
zh: 一项针对大学生社交习惯的调查显示，57%的大学生每天使用手机的时间超过5小时，日常生活基本“机不离手”。

en: New comers in the company love online exchange with colleagues. "We are not familiar with each other when we just come to the company. The likes and comments on social platform makes people much closer to one another. "
zh: 刚进公司的新人热爱跟同事线上交流，“因为才进单位大家不太熟，通过社交平台的点赞评论，关系才比以前近了许多”。

en: "You can respond to your friends when you are willing, because there is a lot of time to think over the words and you can express it more clearly.
zh: “可以在自己方便愿意的时候回复朋友，因为有很多斟酌字句的时间，表述也能更清楚。”

en: However, Xiaopeng, a friend of Wu Yan, thought that Wu Yan is a "very boring otaku."
zh: 然而吴言的朋友小鹏却觉得，生活中的吴言是个“蛮无趣的宅男”。

en: Xiaopeng and Wuyan meet each other in the group chatting. They two get familiar with each other because they are active speakers.
zh: 小鹏和吴言在一个大群里相识，因为两人都是积极发言者，很快就熟络起来了。

en: Xiaopeng thought that Wuyan is quite different from the one on internet. He is quite bored and does not take the initiative to express his views. His words are repeated like this, "Oh, yes, right", or "I will check it online".
zh: 小鹏觉得吴言跟网络上判若两人，言语枯燥，也不主动发表意见，翻来覆去就是几句“呵呵，好的，是吗”，要不就是“这个我要上网查一下”。

en: "Now the tricycle is mostly and illegally operated at night. We hope the competent authorities can also intensify efforts to carry out renovation."
zh: “现在的三轮车多在夜间非法营运，希望主管部门也能加大力度进行整治。”

en: Journalists from Nanhai website learned from the Lingshui Li Autonomous County Public Security Bureau that, the police have now accepted these two cases. The reasons for the two cases, who did it and whether they are related and so on still need further investigation.
zh: 南海网记者从陵水黎族自治县公安局了解到，警方目前已经受理这两起案件的报案，两起案件的起因、何人所为、是否有关联等都在进一步调查中。

en: Wang Wenyi, head of the traffic management station of Lingshui Transportation Bureau said that Lingshui transport sector began to rectify the illegal operation of the passenger tricycle and ban a total of 613 passenger tricycles of illegal operation.
zh: 陵水交通运输局交通管理站站长王文义说，陵水交通部门在今年初开始整治非法营运载客三轮车，共取缔613辆非法营运载客三轮车。

en: The next step is that, the transport sector will apply to the county government and work with several departments to enhance their input on rectifying the county's tricycles, motorcycles, and unlicensed taxi, etc.
zh: 下一步，交通部门将向县政府申请，联合多部门加大力度对全县的三轮车、摩托车、黑车等非法营运车辆进行整治。

en: At 8 am on August 11, Qilu Evening News reporter follows the "Health Chinese" clinic service group to go to Hegou village, West Lake Township, Donggang District.
zh: 8月11日上午8点，齐鲁晚报记者跟随“健康中国行”义诊服务小组来到东港区西湖镇河沟村。

en: The little grandson was aged 11 years old. He was plagued with barbiers at his left foot since 3 years old.
zh: 老人的小孙子今年11岁，从孩子3岁开始，左脚一直受“脚气”困扰。

en: This free clinic is only one part of 'healthy Chinese', in the days to come, other activities will continue to carry out. "
zh: 此次下乡义诊只是‘健康中国行’的其中一个部分，在以后的日子里，其他活动还将陆续开展。”

en: CEO Huang Jiajia said that the strategy for the next five years is bringing the world's best learning resources to the children of China.
zh: CEO黄佳佳表示，将全球最佳的学习资源带给中国的孩子们是他们未来五年的战略。

en: It is learned that "51Talk's biggest advantage lies in its ability to meet the different needs of users of different age groups.
zh: 据了解，“51Talk的最大优势就在于能够满足不同年龄段不同需求的用户。

en: The central bank extends business license valid period of 27 non-bank institutions including Alipay by 5 years
zh: 央行对支付宝等27家非银行机构支付业务许可证续展5年

en: To integrate business resources, play size effect and improve the efficiency of supervision, this renewal will adjust its business scope of the "Payment Business License" payment agencies which are proposed for merging.
zh: 为整合业务资源，发挥规模效应，提高监管效率，本次续展对拟合并《支付业务许可证》的支付机构，相应调整其业务范围。

en: The consolidated payment institution shall complete the payment service undertaking within 6 months from the date of the announcement.
zh: 被合并支付机构应于公告之日起6个月内完成支付业务承接工作。

en: Because there are serious business irregularities, business stagnation or the application for the termination of business types of some payment agencies, etc., this renewal will reduce its business scope.
zh: 因部分支付机构存在业务严重违规、业务停滞萎缩或主动申请终止业务类型等情形，本次续展调减其业务范围。

en: The relevant agencies shall, within 6 months from the date of the announcement, stop the relevant payment business in an orderly manner.
zh: 相关机构应于公告之日起6个月内按要求有序停止开展相关支付业务。

en: The People's Bank of China will continue to carry out the renewal of "Payment Business License" in accordance with the law.
zh: 中国人民银行将继续依法、审慎开展《支付业务许可证》续展工作。

en: Two earthquakes with magnitude 4.4 and 4.5 respectively struck Tibet's Nima County. No casualties were caused temporarily.
zh: 西藏尼玛县连发4.4、4.5级地震暂未造成人员伤亡

en: According to the local civil affairs department, there are no casualties temporarily and details of disaster is still in statistical verification.
zh: 据地方民政部门报告，目前暂未造成人员伤亡，具体灾情正在进一步统计核查中。

en: Francis Reyes, a professor of natural resources and the environment at the National Agricultural University of Nicaragua, led in the whole process of the afforestation project.
zh: 尼加拉瓜国立农业大学自然资源和环境系的教授弗朗西斯科·雷耶斯全程带队参与了植树造林教育项目。

en: "We have reason to believe that the cross-ocean Grand Canal project, also led by the HKND Group, will bring more benefits to the majority of the Nicaraguan people and create more jobs for the local community."
zh: 我们有理由相信同样由HKND集团主导的跨洋大运河项目将会为广大尼加拉瓜人民带来更多的裨益，为当地创造更多的就业机会。”

en: Recently, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, hosted by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai province.
zh: 近日，由中国文联、青海省政府主办的第十届中国国际民间艺术节在青海西宁拉开帷幕。

en: On the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan "Avesta" news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3.7%.
zh: 塔吉克斯坦“阿维斯塔”通讯社11日援引塔央行的消息称，今年前7个月塔国的通货膨胀率为3.7%。

en: According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7%, while the country's inflation is basically above this level.
zh: 根据塔贸易和经济发展部的预测，2016年塔国的经济增长将达到7%，而国家的通胀也基本是在这一水平之上。

en: On the other hand, Asian Development Bank, the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund have given different forecasts for the economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016.
zh: 而亚洲开发银行、世界银行和国际货币基金组织则是对于塔国2016年经济发展和通胀水则纷纷给出了不同的预测。

en: Majored in urban and rural planning, Huang Yilin wanted to visit Sichuan Langzhong and learn the local architectural design, so the family were bound for there.
zh: 就读城乡规划专业的黄伊琳想去四川阆中参观学习当地的建筑设计，于是一家人便前往旅游。

en: Not walking too far, they saw a group of people shouting, so they approached for curiosity.
zh: 刚走了没多远，突然看到一群人在大呼小叫，出于好奇便走上前去。

en: Seeing the "little boy has just disappeared and the little girl desperately fluttered in the water, just with her little brain left above the water and keeping sinking", Huang Yilin, who learned how to swim hurriedly jumped to rescue people.
zh: 眼看着“小男孩已不见了踪影，小女孩在水里拼命扑腾，江面上只露出她的小脑袋，不时往下沉”，小时候学过游泳的黄伊琳急急忙忙地跳下去救人。

en: She tried her best to push the little girl to the embankment. "The slope is particularly slippery, and I am afraid that I have no strength but to sink."
zh: 她拼尽全力把小女孩推到河堤边，“斜坡特别滑，我怕自己没有力气也沉下去了。”

en: "Now, in retrospect, it's really scared! To be honest, when my child does not hold on to the riverbank, my heart is broken soon."
zh: “现在回想起来真的很后怕!说实话，当孩子在河堤上快坚持不下去了，向我求救时，我的心都快碎了。”

en: Because she was forced to learn swimming, she seldom went to swim after mastering the skill. "I did not expect this skill really to come in handy."
zh: 由于是被逼的，黄伊琳在学会游泳之后就很少主动再下水了，“没想到这项技能还真派上了用场”。

en: According to Chen Yiyang, her supervisor, Huang Yilin is the "The Straight A Student" well-known in her class and ready to help.
zh: 据黄伊琳班上的班长陈亦暘介绍，黄伊琳是班里公认的“学霸”，而且乐于助人。

en: The opening ceremony of the first Youth Games of Yunnan Province on the 13th day of the month showed youth vitality
zh: 云南省首届青运会13日开赛开幕式打民族牌展示青春活力

en: The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 13 to August 22 in De Hong Zhou Mang City.
zh: 云南省首届青少年运动会将于8月13日至8月22日在德宏州芒市举行。

en: There are 11 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
zh: 比赛共设有田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等11个项目，涉及180个小项的比赛。

en: According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of "government-led, market operation, frugal race", all preparation work has been in place.
zh: 云南省第一届青运会组委会副主任、省体育局副局长常林介绍，围绕“政府主导、市场运作、节俭办赛”的原则，目前，各项筹备工作已全部到位。

en: The renovation work of Dehong old weightlifting hall and martial arts museum, Mang City Yixiao Wrestling arena, Silver Tower Scenic Area mountain bike track has been completed.
zh: 德宏州老体协举重馆和武术馆、芒市一小摔跤馆、银塔景区山地自行车赛道等修缮工作已完成。

en: At the same time, 70 medical staff and 11 ambulances were deployed from various Dehong hospitals to produce 11 medical teams, which will be responsible for the medical security work of competition site and the accommodation of athletes.
zh: 同时，从德宏州各医院抽调70名医务人员和11辆救护车组成了11个医疗队，负责比赛现场和运动员住宿的医疗保障工作。

en: From September 1, people aged 60 years old to 64 years old can take bus by half-price ticket.
zh: 9月1日起，60岁至64岁的老年人可以半价乘坐城区的公交车。

en: In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 62-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
zh: 11日上午，济宁市公交公司IC卡销售中心，办卡窗口前几位老年人正在排队办卡，62岁的姚大爷拿到老年半价卡。

en: Liu Xia, the deputy director of the computer center of Jining Bus Company, said that she managed more than 200 elderly half-price tickets since August 1.
zh: 济宁市公交公司计算机中心副主任刘霞说，从8月1日开始办理以来，已办了200多张老年半价卡。

en: "To save time for the elderly, the system is upgraded. The elderly free card is reduced from auditing twice per year to once per year. Elderly people with card do not need to commute twice."
zh: “为了方便老年人，对系统进行了升级，老年免费卡由原来一年审两次减少为一次，持卡的老年人不用跑两趟了。”

en: At the same time, the Commission set up a "Shenzhen-Hong Kong stock market transactions interconnection mechanism" special working group, and actively promote the preparatory work. The work will be open this year after the full preparation of the related regulatory rules and technical equipment.
zh: 同时，证监会成立了“深港通”专项工作小组，积极推进“深港通”的各项准备工作，待相关监管规则与技术装备就绪后，今年将择机开通。

en: After the assessment, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62,228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 62,228 mobile phone users.
zh: 经评估，该伪基站设备在２０１５年１０月４日发送短信６２２２８条，造成６２２２８个手机用户人均通讯中断８秒以上至１０分钟以下。

en: Siberian tigers are currently classified as endangered (EN) by the World Conservation Union (IUCN) Red List of Endangered Species.
zh: 东北虎，目前被世界自然保护联盟(IUCN)濒危物种红色名录列为濒危(EN)物种。

en: According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
zh: 据吉林省林业厅介绍，1998年中美俄等国联合监测的数据显示，吉林省仅有野生东北虎4到6只、东北豹3到5只。

en: The latest monitoring data in 2015 showed that 27 wild manchurian tigers and 42 Northeastern leopards were monitored within Jilin province territory.
zh: 2015年最新监测数据显示，仅吉林省境内就监测到野生东北虎27只、东北豹42只。

en: According to Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, Jilin Provincial government has established long-term stable cooperation and exchange mechanism with Russian government.
zh: 据吉林省林业厅介绍，此前吉林省已与俄罗斯建立了长期稳定的合作交流机制。

en: At the 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry department and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.
zh: 在11日结束的2016中国珲春虎豹保护国际论坛上，中俄两国林业部门和动物保护组织再次达成多项共识。

en: After the occurrence of this case and a number of media reports, this has become the focus of the case, with extremely bad social impact.
zh: 此案件发生后，经多家媒体报道后，成为焦点案件，社会影响极坏。

en: As the suspect is a stealing recidivism and repeatedly dealt with by the public security organs, he has strong anti-reconnaissance capabilities. In addition, due to his long-term drug abuse, the often drug addiction makes trial work quite difficult.
zh: 由于该嫌疑人系盗窃惯犯，屡次被公安机关打击处理过，具有较强的反侦察能力，加上他长期吸毒，讯问中毒瘾时常发作，审讯工作非常困难。

en: But their growth rate is extremely slow, sometimes only about 1 cm a year, suggesting that Greenland shark may have an extra-long life.
zh: 但它们的生长速度极其缓慢，有时1年只长约1厘米，这提示格陵兰鲨可能有着格外长的寿命。

en: Traditional dating methods usually use calcified tissue of animals. Some fins can use fins, but this calcified tissue is very scarce in Greenland sharks.
zh: 传统的测年方法通常使用动物的钙化组织，一些鲨鱼中可以使用鳍脊，但这种钙化组织在格陵兰鲨中十分稀少。

en: This method had previously been used to determine the age of whales, but it is the first time to be used to determine the age of sharks and other fish.
zh: 这种方法此前曾用于测定鲸鱼的年龄，但用来确定鲨鱼等鱼类的年龄还是第一次。

en: Their analysis showed that the life span of the largest shark is estimated at 392 years old, with the error of 120 years old.
zh: 他们的分析显示，这头最大的鲨鱼寿命估计为392岁，误差为120岁。

en: In addition, the female Greenland shark is alleged to be sexually matured at about 4 meters in length. That is, it can only reach adulthood at least until the age of 156.
zh: 此外，雌性的格陵兰鲨据称要到身长约4米时才能性成熟，换算成年龄也就是至少要到156岁才成年。

en: From the point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
zh: 从市场表现来看，一年来，人民币汇率双向浮动特征明显，汇率弹性增强，汇率预期总体平稳。

en: Last year, the last remittance measure before "8.11" exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The appreciation of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
zh: 去年“8·11”汇改之前的最后一次汇改措施实施于2005年，十年间人民币对美元显著升值。

en: This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR weight currency.
zh: 今年10月1日，国际货币基金组织将正式接纳人民币，成为ＳＤＲ（特别提款权）权重货币。

en: This week, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 months of this year, China's import and export value of 13.21 trillion yuan, down 3% over the same period last year.
zh: 本周，中国海关总署公布的统计数据显示，今年前7个月，中国进出口总值13.21万亿元人民币，比去年同期下降3％。

en: In July, China's total import and export value fell by only 0.9% year on year. In particular, China's export value had a year-on-year rise of 2.9%.
zh: 而在7月当月，中国进出口总值同比仅下降0.9％，特别是出口同比增长了2.9％。

en: In July, China's total import and export valued 2.09 trillion yuan, a year-on-year fall of 0.9%.
zh: 7月，中国进出口总值2.09万亿元人民币，同比下降0.9％。

en: Although the total value of imports and exports fell year on year, the export data enjoyed growth. This is the fifth consecutive month for export to achieve growth since March this year.
zh: 尽管进出口总值同比依然下降，但出口数据出现了增长，这也是自今年3月以来，出口实现连续第五个月增长。

en: While detecting the case at the same time, the police also pressed for payments and recovered stolen goods totaling more than 33 million yuan.
zh: 在侦破案件的同时，警方还追缴赃款赃物合计人民币3300余万元。

en: During the crime offence period, the criminal suspects swept the floor for theft from top to below by climbing the external wall and breaking the window fence.
zh: 作案过程中犯罪嫌疑人往往以一幢楼为单位，采用外墙攀爬，撬断防盗窗栅栏的方式从上至下“扫楼式”盗窃。

en: Police reminded the general public to lock the doors and windows before going out. In addition, citizens are recommended to choose the relatively hard steel material for anti-theft window.
zh: 警方提醒广大市民群众，外出时务必锁好家中门窗，对于防盗窗的选择，建议市民群众应当选择材质较硬的钢材。

en: In late August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
zh: 据中国之声《新闻晚高峰》报道，8月下旬，日本首相安倍晋三将赴肯尼亚出席第六届非洲开发会议。

en: The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Yokohama, so this meeting will be the first move to Africa.
zh: 非洲开发会议由日本主导，此前的五次会议均是在日本东京或者横滨举行，因此，本次会议也将是首次移师非洲。

en: Japan's "application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council" began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-sponsored African Development Conference also began in 1993. This is not a coincidence.
zh: 日本“入常”之路始于上世纪90年代初，而由日本发起的非洲开发会议同样始于1993年，这不是巧合！

en: Africa has 53 seats in the United Nations and is therefore an important ticket bunker of the United Nation. How can Japan give up Africa if it wanted to join the United Nations Security Council?
zh: 非洲在联合国拥有53个席位，是联合国的重要票仓，日本要想“入常”，又怎么会舍弃非洲？

en: "Western Group" will visit seven countries, including Sierra Leone, Liberia and Guinea Bissau.
zh: “西部组”将访问塞拉利昂、利比里亚、几内亚比绍等7个国家。

en: "In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called 'big ticket field,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
zh: 日本问题专家杨伯江分析称，“从政治方面，非洲虽然相对发展滞后，但是国家数量比较多，所以日本一向把它视为所谓的‘大票田’。”

en: Japan will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
zh: 今后日本是不会放弃的，对于非洲的工作也不会就此终止，会不断加强。

en: Economically, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the domestic demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
zh: 经济方面，因为日本的生产能力比较强，但是国内市场相对有限，特别是目前在少子老龄化背景下，内需相对比较低迷。

en: To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan needs to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
zh: 日本要实现自己的目标，首先要和周边国家搞好关系，其中，无论在地缘政治争夺还是在民族争端以及历史认识问题上，日本需要有一个正确的态度。

en: At 4:20 a.m., the applicant filed a pre-litigation property preservation and were received patiently by judicial police on duty.
zh: 凌晨4点20分，申请人提起诉前财产保全，值班法警耐心接待。

en: By then, Fan Deshang will conduct a comprehensive analysis of the above issues.
zh: 届时,范德尚将对上述问题进行全方位的剖析。

en: Fan Deshang is a Ph.D. in Peking University and a deputy director and secretary general of the Global Governance Research Center of Peking University. He was the former director of Cornell University in Beijing.
zh: 范德尚系北京大学法学博士,北京大学全球治理研究中心副主任兼秘书长,曾任美国康奈尔大学驻北京办公室主任。

en: The current research focuses on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.
zh: 目前研究内容主要集中在全球政治、经济、科技、文化宗教等领域的深刻变化,以及这些变化对国家治理、领导力、全球治理带来的机遇和挑战。

en: Traditional customs introduced a new bright spot "2016 Bon Culture Festival" -The Opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
zh: 传统习俗引入新亮点“2016盂兰文化节”香港维园开幕

en: In addition to the continuation of the existing "Climbing Competition", "parent basin for the heap" for the entire family is also added.
zh: 除了延续已有的“抢孤竞赛”，还增加了全家可以参加的“亲子盆供堆垒赛”。

en: Bon culture history is introduced in the form of comic books. In addition, Bon theme 3D self-timer area, traditional snack area and traditional craft flow classroom are set up at the scene, attracting many friends and overseas travelers for visit.
zh: 不仅用漫画形式介绍盂兰文化历史，现场还设有盂兰主题3D自拍区、传统小食区以及传统手艺流动教室等，吸引不少小朋友和海外人士来体验参观。

en: A French couple lingered at the scene for almost 3 hours and experienced a lot in the mini flower card flow classroom.
zh: 一对来自法国的夫妻在活动现场逗留了近3个小时，并且在迷你花牌流动教室体验了一番。

en: She said, "It is quite pleasant to see sizable and organized ancestor worship ceremony in such a busy financial metropolis of Hong Kong".
zh: 她说，“在香港这么繁忙的金融大都市，还能看到这么有规模、有组织的祭拜祖先的仪式。”

en: "This not only embodies the diversity of Chinese culture, but also allows more people to understand these traditional craft and heritage."
zh: “这不仅体现了中国文化的多元性，还能让更多人了解这些传统手艺并且传承下去。”

en: He also said that this time a total of 24 teams participated in "climbing competition", which is not only organized by communities, but also in combination with schools and attended by students.
zh: 他也表示，这次共有24个队伍参加“抢孤竞赛”，其中不仅有社团组织，还与一些学校合作，让学生参加。

en: On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play "White Snake" and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
zh: １１日晚，中国国家京剧院携名剧《白蛇传》穿越千里来到墨西哥城，在墨国家美术宫为当地民众呈现了一场原汁原味的京剧盛宴。

en: As the key performance project of "Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
zh: 作为“中拉文化交流年”重点演出项目，８月９日至２３日，中国国家京剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城以及科尔多瓦、华雷斯等５座城市演出７场京剧。

en: "This is a fantastic performance. Its music, lighting and stage performances are impressive to me ... ... I think it is necessary to let her daughter understand the Chinese culture and Chinese opera art."
zh: “这是一场精彩绝伦的表演，音乐、灯光、舞台表演都让我印象深刻，……我觉得很有必要让女儿也来了解中国文化和中国京剧艺术。”

en: Next year is the 45th anniversary for the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Mexico. By then there will be more cultural exchange activities held in China and Mexico.
zh: 明年是中墨两国建交４５周年，届时将会有更多文化交流活动在中墨两国举办。

en: Liu Cigui came to Sanya for the research of "Double Restoration and Dual City" and required to enhance the level of urban construction and management
zh: 刘赐贵赴三亚调研“双修、双城”要求提升城市建管水平

en: We should lead to improve the internationalization of international tourism and enrich international elements and build international boutique from the details.
zh: 要在提升国际旅游岛国际化水平中发挥好带头作用，从点滴细节入手，丰富国际元素、打造国际精品。

en: We should lead in "the 100-day social service investment move" and promote a batch of key projects and park construction to ensure the settlement of high-quality project and implement the various requirements of the big move.
zh: 要在“服务社会投资百日大行动”中发挥好带头作用，推动一批重大项目和园区建设，确保高质量项目的落地，把大行动的各项要求落实好。

en: Zhang Qi, the Provincial Standing Committee and Sanya Municipal Party Committee Secretary, Wang Lu, vice governor and Lu Zhiyuan, secretary general of provincial government participated in the research seminars.
zh: 省委常委、三亚市委书记张琦，副省长王路，省政府秘书长陆志远参加调研座谈。

en: Recently, she will work together with Yu Minhong to build the first domestic sports industry innovation and entrepreneurship platform.
zh: 日前，她将和俞敏洪联手共同打造国内第一家体育产业创新创业平台。

en: There was also a team of star coaches in the Chinese sports circle. They were gorgeous in the era of athletes and won countless glory for the country. After retirement, they passed what they learned to the new comers and cultivated a great number of champions.
zh: 中国体坛上也有这样一群明星教练：他们在运动员时代风光无限，为国家赢得无数荣耀；退役后将多年所学传授于后来者，培养出中夺冠军。

en: As the first world champion in Chinese men's gymnastics, Huang Yubin chose to pick up the pointer after retirement.
zh: 作为中国男子体操首位世界冠军，黄玉斌退役后选择拿起教鞭。

en: From the women's team coach to the men's team coach, to the head coach, Huang Yubin created an "Olympic gold group", and led to win 9 gold, 1 silver and 4 copper at the Beijing Olympic Games.
zh: 从女队教练到男队教练，再到总教练，黄玉斌打造了一支“奥运金团”，更率队在北京奥运会取得了9金1银4铜的神话战绩。

en: Since then, Tian Liang has been experiencing advertising endorsement. He has even served as a "Cowherd", "Lei Feng" and other important roles in recent years.
zh: 此后，田亮一直广告代言不断，更是在近年扮演了“牛郎”、“雷锋”等重要角色。

en: Whether it is because of the increase in age or limited playing time, some players will have regressive performance each season.
zh: 无论是因为年龄的增大还是出场时间被限制，每个赛季都有一些球员的表现会出现退步。

en: After coming to Feng Cheng, the Red Star will definitely give the ball right to Butler and Rondo and he himself choose to play healthy in the regular season.
zh: 来到了风城，闪电侠势必把球权更多地让给巴特勒和隆多，自己很可能在常规赛选择养生打法。

en: Okafor's situation is more embarrassing. As the first choice of 76 people last season, he had to compete for playing time and ball right with Simmons and Enby in the new season.
zh: 奥卡福的情况比较尴尬，作为上赛季76人的第一选择，他在新赛季不得不和西蒙斯以及恩比德竞争上场时间和球权。

en: This competition may not come soon. Simmons also need to adapt to the NBA stadium, and Enbi must also be fully recovered from the injury as soon as possible, but whether Okafor can have a position in the long array of 76 people.
zh: 这一竞争可能不会来的很快，西蒙斯还需要适应NBA赛场，恩比德也要尽快从伤病中完全恢复，但是奥卡福能否在76人的长人阵中有位置还是个问题。

en: With Simmons already showing a good point-forward potention, Enbi also has a better stature more suitable for NBA games and Okafor's position is hard to be so solid.
zh: 随着西蒙斯已经展现了出色的控球前锋潜质，恩比德也拥有着更适合NBA比赛的身材，奥卡福的地位恐怕很难再那么稳固了。

en: Oh, yes, James has just brought the first professional sports championship trophy in Cleveland in the past 52 years.
zh: 哦，对了，詹姆斯刚刚为克利夫兰带来了过去52年里第一座职业体育冠军奖杯。

en: Coming to the 14th season of his career, James needs to better conserve his strength and get ready for the playoffs.
zh: 来到了职业生涯第14个赛季的詹姆斯需要更好的保证体力，为季后赛做好准备。

en: On the 12th day of the month of the local time, Huang Jing, chairman of the Moscow Overseas Chinese Association said excitedly while she saw the reporter of Chinanews.com.
zh: 当地时间12日，莫斯科华侨华人联合会主席黄静在看到中新网记者时激动的说道。

en: Not long ago, she participated in the "overseas Chinese culture community Chinese talent (calligraphy, painting) training" hosted by Chinese State Council Overseas Chinese Affairs Office and sponsored by Jinan University.
zh: 前不久，她在国内参加了由中国国务院侨务办公室主办、暨南大学承办的“海外华人文化社团中华才艺(书法、绘画)培训班”。

en: While participating in the training course just now, she did not know where to start in painting and calligraphy. As a result, after the end of the course, she has been able to draw and write her own works.
zh: 刚刚参加培训班时，自己对于书画完全不知道从哪里下手，结果在培训班结束后，已经能画出和写出自己的作品。

en: After returning back to Moscow, I will use the knowledge and skills learned in China to Russia and make my own contribution for the cultural transmission and promotion of the Chinese culture.
zh: 自己回莫斯科后，一定要用所学到的知识和技能，为中华文化的传播和弘扬作出自己的贡献。

en: She said, after she came back to Russia, she would surely carry out the traditional Chinese culture among the Chinese and the Russians who love Chinese culture.
zh: 那延伟说，自己回俄后定要把中华传统文化在华人和热爱中国文化的俄罗斯人中间传播和弘扬下去。

en: At 19:35 today, in one match of the 22nd round of Chinese Football Association Super League, Chongqing Lifan Football Club challenged Beijing Guoan Talent Football Club in the visiting field.
zh: 今日19点35分，在中超第22轮率先开打的一场比赛中，重庆力帆客场挑战北京国安。

en: At the 29th minute, Wang Dong led to scoring one ball. At the 39th minute, with assistance by Fernando, the new support Kardec won the first score of the Chinese Football Association Super League. At the 81st minute, Guoan regained a score.
zh: 第29分钟，王栋操刀点球破门，第39分钟，新援卡尔德克在费尔南多助攻下收获中超首球，第81分钟，国安扳回一球。

en: At the 15th minute, Zhang Xizhe flip through in straight line of the midfield. Ilmaz has been straight for the penalty area and the defensive Liu Yu grab the first leg of the ball and made a fight.
zh: 第15分钟，张稀哲中场直线挑传，伊尔马兹已直冲禁区，单兵防守的刘宇抢先出脚将球破坏。

en: Fernando flipped pass the goal in the back-drawing on his right wing. Alan Kardec was put down by Lei Tenglong. The referee sentenced a spot kick and showed a yellow card to Lei Tenglong.
zh: 费尔南多右路一对二回带后突然挑传门前，卡尔德克前插接应时被雷腾龙飞扑动作放倒，裁判判定点球，并向雷腾龙出示黄牌。

en: Guoan changed a person at the 37th minute. Zhang Xiaobin left the playing field and Zhang Chiming came on the stage and turned his weapon around to defense.
zh: 国安在第37分钟就进行换人调整，张晓彬下场，张池明登场反戈旧主。

en: This is also the time for Alan Kardec to score in the initial games of Chinese Football Association Super League. Lifan leads in 2:0.
zh: 这也是卡尔德克在中超首发的赛事中就取得入球，力帆2:0领先。

en: Just in the beginning of the next half, Fernando won any score on the right side by breaking off. It is a pity that he lobbed in small angle.
zh: 下半场刚刚开场费尔南多就以强行突破赢得右侧任意球，可惜小角度攻门打高。

en: After Deng Xiaofei received a yellow card in the delaying time, Peng Xinli who is alternative also received a yellow card because he fouled in front of the penalty area.
zh: 在邓小飞被判定拖延时间领到黄牌后，替补出场的彭欣力因禁区前犯规也领到黄牌。

en: Liu Yu forcefully tackled and intruded Egor Krimets. He and the exciting Wang Dong got the yellow card.
zh: 刘宇禁区前凶狠铲抢侵犯克里梅茨，他与情绪激动的王栋相继领到黄牌。

en: Ilmaz restricted area within the line forcibly break, in Zheng Yurong leg to stop the action down to the ground, the referee to determine the penalty, Ilmaz surgeon, Lifan 2: 1 national security.
zh: 伊尔马兹禁区线内强行突破，在郑又荣伸腿拦截动作下倒地，裁判判定点球，伊尔马兹操刀破门，力帆2:1国安。

en: At the 86th minute, Zhou Ting sent the cross along the right wing. Sergeyev looped after chesting at the mid-way of the penalty area and shot. Deng Xiaofei sent the ball out with wonderful shoot.
zh: 第86分钟，周挺右路送出传中，谢尔盖耶夫在禁区中路胸部停球后顺势施射，邓小飞再次以精彩扑救将球封出。

en: 4 minutes after the allowance, Lifan kept the 2-1 score to the final and defeated Guoan in the visiting field.
zh: 4分钟补时过后，力帆将2-1的比分保持到终场，于客场战胜国安。

en: Lyman will become an expert for the partner of German Bundesliga Asia media and will participate in a variety of local fan activities.
zh: 莱曼届时将作为德甲亚洲媒体合作伙伴的专家，参加当地各种球迷活动。

en: The event will cover two continents and four top cities. They will work for the preheating of the new season with fans.
zh: 本次活动将横跨两个大洲、覆盖四座顶级城市，他们将在各地和球迷们一起为新赛季预热造势。

en: The representatives of Bundesliga, Bayern Munich, Dortmund and the famous star Thomas Muller, Ram and Goetze have become a household name in China.
zh: 德甲豪门的代表拜仁慕尼黑、多特蒙德和著名球星托马斯·穆勒、拉姆、格策等在中国可谓家喻户晓。

en: With the microblogging, Youku and WeChat Chinese platform of German Bundesliga, which went online previously, German Bundesliga hopes to provide a more extensive and timely and convenient channels to obtain the latest news of the league.
zh: 配合此前德甲已上线的微博、优酷和微信中文平台，德甲方面寄望为中国球迷提供更广泛和及时便捷的渠道，获取该联赛的最新消息。

en: Britain settle for silver in rugby sevens after Fiji masterclass sees them take gold
zh: 英国队在七人制橄榄球赛中获得银牌，斐济队夺得金牌

en: The bruising beating of the Boks, 7-5 in the semi-final earlier in the day, may have come back to bite them in the final.
zh: 当天早些时候，英国队以7比5险胜南非队，这可能影响了他们在决赛中状态。

en: It has been some journey for GB.
zh: 英国队能取得今天的成绩实属不易。

en: Eight years ago, under Ryan, they lost every game at the Adelaide Sevens.
zh: 八年前，在瑞恩的执教下，他们在阿德莱得国际七人制橄榄球赛上未尝胜果。

en: This hammering will hurt but the progress is startling.
zh: 虽然他们受到了巨大的打击，但也取得了十分惊人的进步。

en: Fiji started magnificently, bouncing off GB tackles for fun.
zh: 斐济开场就占据优势，使英国队毫无招架之力。

en: It was like running into a series of moving buses for captain Tom Mitchell and co and the World Series champions went 5-0 up when Osea Kolinisau dived over in the corner.
zh: 对于汤姆·米切尔和他的队友而言，这就像撞上了一连串正在行驶的公共汽车。当欧西·科林尼索冲入角旗区时，这支世界系列赛冠军球队已经以5比0的比分遥遥领先了。

en: 12-0 and GB had hardly touched the ball.
zh: 12比0，英国队几乎没有碰到过球。

en: Nakarawa added another from the restart and there was still over a minute on the clock ... in the first half.
zh: 那卡拉瓦又得一分，而比赛……的上半场还剩1分钟。

en: Vatemo Ravouvou then burst through some more limp GB tackling and stormed to the line to score.
zh: 然后，瓦特莫·拉沃沃冲破英国队的防守，直达得分线。

en: It was as if Fiji had been born to play 7s, while GB are still learning the trade.
zh: 斐济人就好像生来就是打7人制橄榄球的，而英国队仍是初出茅庐。

en: Dan Norton grabbed a try for GB, touching down in the left corner to make it 36-7 but the game was long gone the way of the South Sea Islanders whose fans sang, waved flags and danced in the stands.
zh: 丹·诺顿为英国队创造了得分的机会，他在左角触地，将比分更改为36比7，但比赛早已在南海岛国的掌控中，他们的球迷在站台上高声歌唱、挥舞旗帜、载歌载舞。

en: It was hard not to admire Fiji's whole joyful approach.
zh: 斐济队的精彩表现令人不得不拍手称快。

en: The whistle went, the Fijians embraced and GB hit the turf, thoroughly beaten.
zh: 终场哨声响起，斐济人拥抱在一起，而完败的英国队只能遗憾退场。

en: Earlier in the day, Fiji had beaten Japan 20-5 in their semi-final and GB edged South Africa in a tight semi-final of one try each - Britain's conversion the difference.
zh: 当天早些时候，斐济队在半决赛中以20比5击败了日本队，而英国对在一场激烈的半决赛对决中险胜南非队。

en: Kyle Brown put the Boks ahead in the first half but Dan Norton with some dazzling footwork broke the line and scored under the posts in the second half.
zh: 上半场凯尔·布朗帮助南非队取得领先，但丹·诺顿在下半场凭借出色的脚法破门得分。

en: From the first stroke to the last, 220 punishing heaves into history, Helen Glover and Heather Stanning found added meaning in their golden moment at the Estacio da Lagoa.
zh: 从第一次划桨开始到现在，海伦·格拉芙和希瑟·斯坦宁已接受了220次惩罚性拉举训练，而她们在 Estacio da Lagoa夺得的这块金牌具有更非凡的的意义。

en: What we see, two brilliant athletes skating over the surface with the elegance of swans, does not wholly reflect the nature of the triumph.
zh: 我们所看到的是这两名天才运动员在水面上优雅前行，但这并不是这一胜利的全部。

en: As he said, it was touch and go.
zh: 正如他所说，死亡随时可能到来。

en: Williams was diagnosed in December 2013.
zh: 威廉姆斯在2013年12月被确诊为癌症。

en: The trio were fortunate that he was able to begin his treatment at the start of 2014 out of season, keeping the disruption to a minimum, if that is ever the right expression in circumstances such as these.
zh: 幸运的是，他在2014年年初开始了治疗，将影响降到最低，虽然在这种情况下这么说可能并不合适。

en: I was in hospital and I was walking around the ward - 20ft, 30ft 50ft at a time when they were saying a few steps is enough.
zh: 我住在医院里，虽然他们说走几步就足够了，但我还是每次绕着病房走上20英尺、30英尺、50英尺。

en: It just reiterates how much this means to me, how much me and Helen have worked and Robin as well.
zh: 它反复告诉我这对于我而言有多重要，我、海伦以及罗宾付出了多大的努力。

en: The pair set a punishing rhythm that their rivals could never match.
zh: 这对组合所设置的惩罚力度是她们的对手所无法比拟的。

en: Even in the final 500 metres when the crews from New Zealand and Denmark began to close, Stanning and Glover had too much in reserve.
zh: 即便是在最后的500米，新西兰队和丹麦队开始逼近时，斯坦宁和格拉芙仍有大量的体能储备。

en: We had a good start and at the same time we weren't looking to do anything amazing.
zh: 我们有一个很好的开始，同时我们并没有期盼着做什么惊天动地的大事。

en: Glover has a wedding to attend next month, her own to television adventurer Steve Backshall.
zh: 格拉芙下个月将与电视探险员史蒂夫·巴克沙尔结婚。

en: For now she just wants to enjoy the moment.
zh: 不过现在，她只想享受当下。

en: That would have meant too much pressure.
zh: 这会给我带来太大的压力。

en: In London it took about six months to realise that I was an Olympic champion.
zh: 在伦敦，我用了约六个月时间才意识到我是奥运冠军。

en: This feels so much better," she said.
zh: 她表示“我感觉好多了。”

en: Gee and Schwartzman are scheduled to discuss and share images of the 1926 Bertram Goodhue design as well as the 1993 restoration and addition by Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates.
zh: 吉和斯瓦茨曼将讨论并分享1926年贝特伦·古德西的设计图片以及1933年哈迪・霍尔兹曼・弗夫尔事务所的修复与扩建图片。

en: The salon is set for 2 p.m. to 4 p.m. on Aug. 21 in the Salle Moderne at the Art Deco Southwestern School of Law, (formerly Bullocks Wilshire), 3050 Wilshire Blvd.
zh: 此次沙龙的时间为：8月21日下午2点至4点，地点：Salle Moderne，Art Deco Southwestern School of Law（前Bullocks Wilshire)，3050 Wilshire Blvd。

en: Celebrating L.A.'s Central Library's 90th birthday with - what else? - a new book
zh: 庆祝洛杉矶中央图书馆90周年以及新书的发售

en: This is the highest value in years (since June 2012) and the first one above zero since October of last year when a positive 0.2% was posted.
zh: 这是几年来（自2012年6月起） 最高的通货膨胀率。去年10月 （通货膨胀率0.2%） 之后，通货膨胀率首次突破零点。

en: The annual average inflation, measured by CPI, in the last 12 months (August 2015 - July 2016) compared to the previous 12 months (August 2014 - July 2015) was -0.8%.
zh: 相比之前的12个月 （2014年8月至2015年7月），过去12个月 （2015年8月至2016年7月） 的年平均通货膨胀率 （以消费者价格指数衡量）为 -0.8%。

en: The inflation rate since the beginning of the year (July 2016 compared to December 2015) has been -0.2% and the annual inflation in July 2016 compared to July 2015 was -0.2%.
zh: 今年至今的通货膨胀率 （2016年7月相对于2015年12月） 为 -0.2%。相比2015年7月，2016年7月的年通货膨胀率为 -0.2%。

en: Prices remained at the same level as in the previous month in alcoholic beverages and tobacco; housing, water, electricity, gas and other fuels; communications; and education.
zh: 与上月价格持平的有酒精饮料和烟草、住房、水、电、天然气和其他燃料、通信、教育。

en: With its lens tool, Snapchat allows some 150 million daily users to alter reality and play with identity in ways that border on the absurd.
zh: Snapchat的1.5亿名日常用户可以通过其滤镜工具改变现实并且将人像变得滑稽可笑。

en: You can turn yourself into a pineapple, a dog or a character befitting a Roy Lichtenstein painting.
zh: 你可以把自己变成一颗菠萝、一只狗或一个罗伊·利希滕斯坦画中的角色。

en: The lenses are blunt, feature-warping tools that generate more than 30 million enhanced selfies a day.
zh: 这些透镜具有钝化、弯曲特征的效果，每天产生3000多万张经过修饰的自拍。

en: So when it pushed a lens to some users this week that gave them slanted eyes, distorted teeth and puffy cheeks, some critics called it a racist caricature of Asian people - "yellowface."
zh: 因此，当该应用本周为一些用户提供了一个可以创造斜眼、怪牙和粉脸效果的滤镜时，一些评论家将其称为对亚洲“黄种人”的种族讽刺。

en: And they wondered if these repeated controversies pointed to a larger problem that the company has with diversity.
zh: 他们甚至认为这些反复出现的问题是否意味着该公司在多样性上存在较大的问题。

en: The company offered an explanation: The lens was meant as homage to anime characters, not as a caricature of Asian people.
zh: 该公司的解释是：该滤镜是对动漫角色致敬，而非讽刺亚洲人。

en: Others roundly rejected the anime comparison.
zh: 其他人也坚决反对这些动漫形象。

en: It shows that the filter isn't just yellowface, but yellowface taken to its derogatory extreme.
zh: 虽然滤镜中不只是黄种人，但黄种人被极端贬低。

en: Snapchat is not the only company to cross these cultural tripwires.
zh: Snapchat并不是唯一一家触及这些文化底线的公司。

en: American culture seems involved in an endless struggle over diversity and inclusion, from corporate boardrooms to Hollywood and the devices we all carry in our hands.
zh: 从公司董事会到好莱坞以及我们携带的设备，美国文化似乎一直在提倡多样性与包容性。

en: When one of Snapchat's lenses creates an image that is insulting to a user, 25-year-old Katie Zhu said in an interview on Thursday, "it's much harder for these types of things to go unnoticed like they did before."
zh: 当Snapchat的一个滤镜产生了侮辱用户的形象时，25岁的朱凯蒂 （音译） 在周四的采访中表示：“相比以前，此类事物更难逃过人们的视线。”

en: In an essay for Medium and in a telephone interview, she said she believed that the race-related controversies reflected a lack of diversity in hiring practices at Snapchat.
zh: 在一篇为Medium所写的文章和一次电话采访中，她表示自己认为种族方面的争议反映了Snapchat在招聘过程中缺乏种族多样性。

en: Ms. Zhu criticized the company's mostly white, all-male leadership and ended her essay with a hashtag: #DeleteSnapchat.
zh: 朱女士批评该公司的员工大多数为白人，领导层全部为男性并且在文章的最后加上了一个标签：#DeleteSnapchat。

en: Other observers share her view, a complaint that Snapchat has left largely unanswered.
zh: 其他观察者分享了她没有被Snapchat回应的投诉。

en: For her part, Ms. Zhu said she would keep her Snapchat account closed, adding, "I wonder if they actually need more users like us to be able to say that this is not O.K."
zh: 朱女士表示，她将关闭她的 Snapchat 帐号：“我想知道他们是否需要更多像我们这样反对这一行为的用户。”

en: "Intelligence products approved by senior Centcom leaders typically provided a more positive depiction of U.S. antiterrorism efforts than was warranted by facts on the ground and were consistently more positive than analysis produced by other elements of the intelligence community," a news release about the report said.
zh: 根据一份关于该报告的新闻，“经过中央司令部高级领导者审核的情报对于美国反恐行动的描述比实际情况更乐观，并且始终比其他情报机构的分析更乐观。”

en: Although it offers no definitive evidence that senior Obama administration officials ordered the reports to be doctored, it describes analysts as feeling as though they were under pressure from Centcom leaders to present a more optimistic view of the threat posed by the Islamic State, also known as ISIS or ISIL.
zh: 虽然没有确定性的证据表明，奥巴马政府的高层官员下令更改这些报告，但根据报告的描述，这些分析员感到自己受到了来自中央司令部领导者的压力，迫使他们对伊斯兰国 （ISIS或ISIL) 的威胁发表更乐观的意见。

en: "After months of investigation, this much is very clear," Representative Mike Pompeo, Republican of Kansas, said in a statement.
zh: 堪萨斯州共和党代表迈克·蓬佩奥在一份声明中表示：“经过数月的调查，这一结果已十分明显。”

en: Republicans created the task force after learning that analysts had raised concerns that intelligence about the Islamic State was being manipulated.
zh: 共和党在从分析员那里得知有关伊斯兰国的情报被操控后，成立了一个专项工作小组。

en: The report released Thursday is to be followed up by more extensive findings as the investigation continues.
zh: 随着调查的继续，继周四发布的这篇报告后将会有更多发现。

en: There is an additional, ongoing investigation of Centcom intelligence by the Department of Defense inspector general.
zh: 国防部总检察长也对中央司令部进行了长期调查。

en: "Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom created an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces," Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
zh: 委员会民主党领袖代表谢安达在一份声明中表示：2014年至2015年期间，中央司令部针对伊斯兰国和伊拉克维和部队的情报评估制定了一项过于狭隘的流程。”

en: This process, Mr. Schiff said, "stalled the release of intelligence products," hurt morale among analysts and "insufficiently accommodated dissenting views."
zh: 谢安达先生表示，该流程“妨碍了情报的发布”、降低了分析员的士气并且“无法接受不同的意见。”

en: Lt. Cmdr. Patrick Evans, a Pentagon spokesman, said in a statement that the Defense Department would not comment on the congressional report while the inspector general's investigation continued.
zh: 五角大楼发言人海军少校帕特里克·埃文斯在一份声明中表示，在总检察长的调查未结束前，国防部不对这份国会报告发表任何评论。

en: But he said that "experts sometimes disagree on the interpretation of complex data, and the intelligence community and Department of Defense welcome healthy dialogue on these vital national security topics."
zh: 但他表示：“专家有时会对复杂数据的解读产生分歧，而情报机构和国防部鼓励就这些重要的国家安全主题进行健康的对话。”

en: But last year's allegations called into question how much President Obama could rely on Central Command for honest assessments of military operations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya and other crisis spots.
zh: 但去年，这些主张使公众质疑奥巴马总统可以在多大程度上信任中央司令部所发布的伊拉克、阿富汗、利比亚和其他危机地区的军事行动评估。

en: The critiques on the Islamic State intelligence mirror disputes of more than a decade ago, when a Centcom intelligence analyst, Gregory Hooker, wrote a research paper saying that the administration of President George W. Bush, over many analysts" objections, advocated a small force in Iraq and spent little time thinking about what would follow the 2003 invasion.
zh: 有关伊斯兰国情报的批评令人想起出十多年前的争议，当时中央司令部情报分析员格雷戈里·胡克撰写了一篇研究文章，文中指出乔治·布什的政府不顾众多分析员的反对，坚持派遣小规模的部队前往伊拉克并且几乎没有考虑2003年入侵后的情况。

en: General Austin retired in April and was replaced at Central Command by Gen. Joseph L. Votel.
zh: 奥斯汀将军于4月退役，目前由约瑟夫·沃特尔接替他在中央司令部的职位。

en: U.S. Wins 4th Straight in Women's Field Hockey, Setting Up Showdown With Britain
zh: 美国在女子曲棍球赛中获得四连胜，将与英国一决胜负

en: Five goals in two games should be a memorable feat, but Bam, 27, said she was not sure if she had ever done the same thing.
zh: 两场比赛五粒进球堪称技惊四座，但27岁的巴姆却表示她不知道自己有如此出色的表现。

en: I'm not really one of those people who keeps track of their goals.
zh: 我不是那种会记住自己进过几个球的人。

en: Here is what she does know: The Americans are 4-0 in the Olympic tournament and are tied for first place in their group with Britain, which remained unbeaten after defeating Japan, 2-0, on Thursday.
zh: 她所知道的是美国队在奥运会上已取得四连胜并且将与小组中在周四以2比0战胜了日本队后未尝败绩的英国队争夺小组第一。

en: Britain and the United States will meet on Saturday in the last game of the first round.
zh: 英国和美国在周六第一轮最后一场比赛中狭路相逢。

en: Both teams have qualified for the quarter finals, and the game will decide who finishes first in their six-team bracket and who finishes second.
zh: 两队均以晋级四分之一决赛，这场比赛将决定谁以小组第一的身份出现。

en: The first-place finisher will avoid the powerful Dutch, the leaders of the other bracket, for a bit longer when the quarter finals begin.
zh: 取得小组第一的球队将避免遇到强大的荷兰队，从而能够走得更远。荷兰队以另一小组第一的身份出线。

en: However Saturday's game turns out, the Americans have created a stir with their surprising run here, four years after finishing last among 12 teams at the London Games.
zh: 在周六的比赛中，美国队以惊人的表现创造了奇迹。要知道在四年前的伦敦奥运会上，美国队在12支队伍中垫底。

en: She missed out on the 2008 Olympics when she did not make the cut for the final roster.
zh: 由于未能入选最终名单，她错过了2008年奥运会。

en: Then came 2012, when nothing much went right for her and her teammates.
zh: 2012年，她和她的队友都不被看好。

en: The next year, Craig Parnham, an Englishman, was named the coach, and things began to change.
zh: 第二年，英国人克雷格·帕纳姆担任主教练，一切开始发生改变。

en: We didn't have the work rate in London that we have now.
zh: 我们当时在伦敦还未达到目前的水平。

en: On Thursday night, Bam opened the scoring in the first half with a backhand shot from close in.
zh: 周四晚上，巴姆在上半场以一记近距离反手射门先拔头筹。

en: India had come into the game without a victory in the tournament, but the team proved surprisingly tough and kept the score 1-0 until late in the third period, when Bam took charge.
zh: 印度的在本届比赛中还未尝胜果，但这支队伍表现出了惊人的顽强斗志并且将1比0的比分保持到第三节快结束时，这时巴姆爆发了。

en: She made a long run with the ball down the left side of the field, then curled into the middle and whipped the ball into the goal to give the Americans a 2-0 lead.
zh: 她带球沿球场左侧长途奔袭，随后内切到中路，抽射入网，美国队2比0领先。

en: The shutout was the first of the tournament for the United States goalie, Jackie Briggs, who had allowed one goal in each of the first three victories.
zh: 美国对门将杰基·布里吉斯在本届比赛上首次零封对手，在前三场胜利中，对手各打入一球。

en: A gourmand, President Roosevelt had a taste for fancy Fifth Avenue foods like pâté de foie gras and Maryland terrapin soup.
zh: 作为一名美食家，罗斯福总统喜欢第五大道的美食，比如鹅肝酱和马里兰炖水鱼。

en: "It was an act of culinary solidarity with the people who were suffering," Jane Ziegelman said.
zh: 珍·齐格曼表示：“这是为了在食物上与正在受苦的人们同甘共苦。”

en: Her husband, Andrew Coe, added, "It was also a message to Americans about how to eat."
zh: 她的丈夫安德鲁·科补充道：“这也体现了美国人的饮食方式。”

en: Mr. Coe's last book, "Chop Suey," was about Chinese cuisine in America, while Ms. Ziegelman told the story of life in a Lower East Side tenement through food in her book "97 Orchard."
zh: 科先生的上一本书《炒杂烩菜》是关于美国的中餐，而齐格曼女士在她的《97果园》一书中通过食物讲述了贫民区租客们的生活故事。

en: Ms. Ziegelman, 54, ordered a cream cheese and chopped olive sandwich, while Mr. Coe, 57, had the turkey, mashed potatoes and vegetable medley.
zh: 54岁的齐格曼女士点了一份奶油芝士配碎橄榄三明治，而57岁的科先生点了火鸡、土豆泥和蔬菜拼盘。

en: When a reporter ordered meatloaf, the couple deemed it fitting for a discussion of Depression-era eating.
zh: 记者点了一份烘肉卷，这对夫妻认为这些菜适合讨论大萧条时期的饮食。

en: "Loaves were very popular," Ms. Ziegelman said.
zh: 齐格曼女士说：“当时面包非常流行。”

en: Imagine eating enough peanuts to serve as your dinner.
zh: 想象一下，你的晚餐都是花生。

en: In the years before the Depression, the American table, especially in rural areas, was an all-you-can-eat buffet.
zh: 在大萧条发生前的几年，美国人顿顿都是自助餐，尤其是在郊区。

en: Teams of women cooked for male farmworkers, and fresh-baked pie was served at breakfast, lunch and dinner.
zh: 一群女人为男农场工人们烧饭，早餐、午餐和晚餐都有刚考出来的馅饼。

en: It was Americans who had sent food to starving Europeans during World War I. "A Square Meal" chronicles the ways the nation coped with suddenly not being the land of plenty.
zh: 一战中，正是美国人将食物送给了饥饿的欧洲人。《丰盛大餐》记录了这个国家是如何突然不再成为一个富足之地。

en: "This was a time when food became a central, fraught subject for the American people," Mr. Coe said, explaining why he and his wife wanted to write about it.
zh: 科先生解释了为何他和他的妻子要写这本书：“当时，食物已成为令美国人感到不快的主要话题。”

en: Equally fraught was the new budget diet: Mystery dishes like loaves and casseroles became staples, the casserole a "wonderful way to repurpose leftovers," Ms. Ziegelman noted, because cooks could hide unappetizing ingredients under a creamy coating of sauce.
zh: 另一个不愉快的话题是寒酸的新食物：面包和炖菜等“迷之食物”成为了主菜，炖菜是“最佳的剩菜烹饪方式”，齐格曼女士说道，这是因为厨师们可以使用酱料中的奶油掩盖难吃的食材。

en: Fresh fruit was replaced with cheaper dried fruit.
zh: 新鲜的水果被便宜的干果所代替。

en: Strange mashups were tried as caloric and nutritional fulfillment took precedent over taste or even common kitchen sense.
zh: 奇怪的大杂烩只考虑卡路里，比起味道、甚至是基本的烹饪常识，人们最先考虑的是营养。

en: In researching the book, which includes recipes, Ms. Ziegelman prepared a period dish of baked onion stuffed with peanut butter.
zh: 在研究本书，包括各种食谱的过程中，齐格曼女士制作了一份塞满花生油的烤洋葱。

en: "It was not a popular addition to the dinner table," Mr. Coe said.
zh: 科先生说道：“这在晚餐的餐桌上并不常见。”

en: Ms. Ziegelman amplified: "It was surreal."
zh: 齐格曼女士表示：“这也太奇怪了”。

en: Peanut butter has nothing to say to a baked onion.
zh: 花生油与烤洋葱根本无法搭配。

en: It was characteristic of a lot of the home-ec recipes.
zh: 这是许多家庭经济餐的特点。

en: As never before or since, home economists - among them Louise Stanley, chief of the federal Bureau of Home Economics from 1923 to 1943 - drove the country's eating habits.
zh: 家庭经济学家们影响着这个国家的饮食习惯，比如1923年至1943年担任联邦家庭经济局主厨的路易斯·斯坦利等人，这在历史上是绝无仅有的。

en: He ate in almost a gold-plated dining room, wearing a dinner jacket.
zh: 他穿着一件晚礼服，在一间镀金的餐厅中就餐。

en: President Roosevelt may have committed the same error if his wife, Eleanor, had not encouraged him to set an example with his stomach.
zh: 如果不是妻子埃莉诺鼓励他在饮食上树立榜样，罗斯福总统可能也会犯相同的错误。

en: The legacy is in our continued focus on calories and nutrition, Ms. Ziegelman said, and on the way science has been applied to cooking.
zh: 齐格曼女士表示，所留下的是我们对卡路里和营养的关注以及将科学应用到烹饪中。

en: Ms. Ziegelman recalled: "She actually got people sick."
zh: 齐格曼女士回忆道：“她实际上让许多人生了病。”

en: There was the cream-puff incident.
zh: 比如曾经发生过一起“奶油泡芙”事件。

en: After the plates were cleared at Eisenberg's, she and Mr. Coe pulled out a dessert they had prepared at home: the prune dessert that President Roosevelt ate for lunch.
zh: 在撤掉盘子后，她与科先生拿出了他们在家准备的一份甜品：这就是罗斯福总统在午餐中所吃的果脯布丁。

en: Mr. Coe went back for seconds, and thirds.
zh: 科先生又吃了第二匙、第三匙。

en: The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46,000 barrels/day to 33.11 million barrels/day.
zh: OPEC周三公布的月报显示，包括加蓬在内的整个OPEC组织7月产量上升4.6万桶/日，至3311万桶/日。

en: OPEC also said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the degree of excess supply to the market.
zh: OPEC还在月报中表示，原油价格低廉已促使全球炼油商生产更多精炼油品，从而加重了市场供应过剩的程度。

en: As of Wednesday's close, the light crude oil futures of New York Mercantile Exchange fell by 2.48% in September and the future price of crude oil in October in London Brent fell by 2.07%.
zh: 截至周三收盘，纽约商品交易所9月交货的轻质原油期货价格下跌2.48%，10月交货的伦敦布伦特原油期货价格下跌2.07%。

en: Reuters believes that the proposed meeting of the oil-producing countries is unlikely to tighten the supply. The data released by US Energy Information Administration also suppress the market sentiment.
zh: 路透社认为，提议召开的产油国会议不太可能令供应明显收紧，美国能源信息署公布的数据也打压市场人气。

en: Helima Croft, head of commodity strategy at Royal Bank of Canada, said OPEC changed the market sentiment by releasing signals that they would make an agreement.
zh: 加拿大皇家银行大宗商品策略主管克罗夫特（Helima Croft）表示，OPEC通过释放他们将促成协议的信号来改变市场的情绪。

en: This means like a smoke and a mirror that draws people's attention (deliberately giving a false impression).
zh: 这个手段就像是引开人视线的烟雾与镜子（故意给人错误印象）。

en: Eugen Weinberg, director of commodity research at the German commercial bank, said the possibility of OPEC trying to stabilize the market through the September meeting was low.
zh: 德国商业银行大宗商品研究主管温伯格（Eugen Weinberg）称，人们认为OPEC试图通过9月会议稳定市场的可能性很低。

en: All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
zh: 各地要将违规发布医疗广告、投诉举报集中、既往被多次处罚的医疗机构作为抽查重点。

en: According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 20% of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
zh: 另据香港艾力彼医院管理研究中心数据显示，创业一年内的互联网医疗公司大量死亡，约20%的初创互联网医疗企业已不复存在。

en: It seems that the Internet medical business shall not "swarm", but to see the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.
zh: 看来，互联网医疗创业断不可“一窝蜂”，而是要看准市场需求，沉得下心做专，做深。

en: Yuyue invested 12 million yuan, accounting for 40% of the registered capital, while Jiuzhoutong invested 18 million yuan, accounting for 60% of the registered capital.
zh: 鱼跃出资1200.00万元，占注册资本的40%，九州通器械公司出资1800.00万元，占注册资本的60%。

en: The cooperation between Yuyue and Jiuzhoutong is aimed at the needs of the market, helping the hospital to build advanced supply chain management system, and take this opportunity to seek more cooperation.
zh: 此次鱼跃与九州通的合作正是瞄准了市场的需求，帮助医院搭建先进供应链管理系统，并以此为契机谋求更多合作。

en: Unlike many Internet medical companies which go in for grandiose projects, iBaby focuses on the Internet obstetrics vertical field and be professional on pregnant mothers and doctors.
zh: 与很多互联网医疗公司贪大求全不同，iBaby从最初就专注于互联网产科垂直领域，深耕孕妈和医生两端。

en: Pregnant women can not only enjoy 24 hours of medical services free of charge and one-on-one inquiry with doctors, but also pay for medical counseling.
zh: 孕妈不仅可以免费24小时和一对一的主管医生问诊，还可以付费定向寻医问诊。

en: At present, three plates are set up for doctor's client side, respectively, for doctors to continue education, social exchange and communication.
zh: 目前医生端开设三个板块，分别为医生继续教育、医生社交和医生求助。

en: The following services are provided, including online learning, case discussion and academic exchange; social platform for the exchange of doctors of the same hospital and department; legal assistance, business support and other services required by doctor-patient relationship or personal life.
zh: 提供包括在线学习、病例讨论、学术交流；同医院、同科室医生之间社交平台；医患关系或个人生活所需要的法律援助、创业支持等服务内容。

en: According to media reports, CEO Wang Lei recently said Ali health "is willing to get down" to win big health data.
zh: 据媒体报道，CEO王磊近日表示阿里健康“愿意沉下心来”拿下健康大数据。

en: Internet companies and data companies are short of professionalism. No unity can be provided on the same entry.
zh: 互联网公司、数据公司缺少专业性，在同一词条上的书写方法上都达不到统一。

en: The layout of Ali in the medical and health field is divided into three plates, namely, Ali Health, Lynx Pharmacy and Alipay future hospital.
zh: 阿里目前在医疗健康领域的布局分为三块，分别是阿里健康、天猫医药馆和支付宝未来医院。

en: Brazil Olympic Games is in full swing. Even if the event is broadcast in the midnight in China, many people will stay up late to watch.
zh: 巴西奥运会赛事正如火如荼地进行，即便赛事播出时在国内是半夜时分，很多市民也会熬夜观看。

en: In this regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
zh: 对此，医生特别提醒，熬夜看赛事存在健康隐患，有可能引发心血管疾病。

en: If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
zh: 如果长时间熬夜，该激素仍会大量分泌，人体会持续处于紧张兴奋的状态，无法得到正常的恢复，容易引起血管收缩、血压升高，从而引起心血管疾病。

en: For old friends, Han Zhiyuan suggested them better not stay up late to watch games, particularly those with cardiovascular disease.
zh: 对于老年朋友，韩志远建议，尽量不要为了看奥运比赛而熬夜，特别是有心血管疾病史的群体。

en: During the last "World Cup" football match, Han Zhiyuan received a 60-year-old patient. His onset of myocardial infarction may be related with staying up late to watch games.
zh: 在上届“世界杯”足球赛期间，韩志远曾接诊过一名60多岁的患者，其心肌梗塞的引发或与熬夜看比赛有关。

en: According to Han Zhiyuan, his department had treated some 25-year-old myocardial infarction or stroke patients. This is largely due to long-term stay up of patients.
zh: 韩志远介绍，今年以来，其科室已接诊了一些25岁左右的心肌梗塞或者脑中风患者，这很大程度上是患者长期熬夜的生活方式造成的。

en: 1. Do not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.
zh: 1.不要每天都熬夜，偶尔熬夜观看最喜欢的体育项目，其他项目不妨等第二天看赛事重播。

en: 2. You may drink more water, have more fruit during stay up as this can prevent blood clogging and enhance your body immunity.
zh: 2.熬夜时适时补充水分，多吃水果，可预防血管堵塞、增强机体免疫力。

en: On August 12 Beijing time, after three posture finals of women's 50-meters rifle in 2016 Rio Olympic Games, Chinese veteran Du Li won the bronze medal.
zh: 北京时间8月12日消息，2016年里约奥运会女子50米步枪三种姿势决赛战罢，中国老将杜丽获得铜牌。

en: Du Li became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
zh: 杜丽成为奥运四朝元老，4次奥运共拿下2金1银1铜四块奖牌。

en: In 1998, she became a member of Shandong Province shooting team and followed Coach Wang Dewen for professional shooting training.
zh: 1998年，进入山东省射击队，跟随王德文教练进行专业的射击训练。

en: In June, 2003, she participated in the women's 10-m air rifle of World Cup Croatia station and broke the world record with 504.9 rings.
zh: 2003年6月，参加射击世界杯克罗地亚站女子10米气步枪金牌并以504.9环打破世界纪录。

en: In August, 2008, she scored a gold and broke the Olympic record for 690.3 rings in the 50-m sports rifle three positions.
zh: 2008年8月，在50米运动步枪三姿的比赛中以总成绩690.3环破奥运会纪录夺得金牌。

en: In August, 2012, after serious failing in the London Olympic Games, Du Li announced the application for a temporary retirement to the International Stainless Steel Forum (ISSF).
zh: 2012年8月，折戟伦敦奥运会后，杜丽向国际射联申报了暂时退役申请。

en: In January, 2015, Du Li announced the return to the national team to begin training and prepare for the Rio Olympics.
zh: 2015年1月，杜丽宣布重回国家队开始训练，备战里约奥运。

en: In March, 2016, after the Rio Olympic qualification trials, after a lapse of 8 years, she won the women's 10-meter air rifle eligibility for the Olympic Games.
zh: 2016年3月，里约奥运选拔赛结束，时隔8年再次获得女子10米气步枪奥运会参赛资格。

en: On August 6, 2016, Du Li scored a silver medal with 207 rings in the women's 10-meter air rifle of the Rio Olympic Games.
zh: 2016年8月6日，在里约奥运会女子十米气步枪赛事中，杜丽以207环的成绩获得银牌。

en: On August 12, 2016, she won the bronze medal in the women's 50-meter air rifle of the Rio Olympic Games.
zh: 2016年8月12日，在里约奥运会女子50米步枪三种姿势比赛中，获得铜牌。

en: The documentary "Polar" is a large-scale work that focuses on the world's third pole, Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. It tells a story for the integration of Tibetan tradition and the modern world and the interaction between Tibet and the world from a new perspective.
zh: 纪录片《极地》是一部聚焦地球第三极青藏高原的大型作品，以全新视角讲述藏地传统与现代交融以及西藏与世界互动的故事。

en: The biggest advantage for VR works is to enable the audience to have a unique movie watching "immersion" and this also raise a higher request for the shooting process.
zh: VR作品的最大优势是令观众具有独一无二的观影“沉浸”感，而这也对拍摄过程提出了更高要求。

en: But what is little known is that during the Cold War, a strong solar storm has almost led to a nuclear war of the United States against the Soviet Union. The incident has not been announced by the researchers until August 9.
zh: 但鲜为人知的是，同样是冷战期间，一场强烈的太阳风暴也曾险些导致美国对苏联发动核战争，这一事件直到8月9日才首次由研究人员对外公布。

en: On May 23, 1967, a strong solar storm caused strong interference to the radar and radio communications of the US military in the Arctic.
zh: 1967年5月23日，一场强烈的太阳风暴对美国军方位于北极的雷达与无线电通信造成强烈干扰。
